Package nl.harm27.obswebsocket.api.requests.recording

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GetRecordingFolder
    Get the path of the current recording folder.
    GetRecordingFolder.Request  
    GetRecordingFolder.Response  
    PauseRecording
    Pause the current recording.
    PauseRecording.Request  
    PauseRecording.Response  
    ResumeRecording
    Resume/unpause the current recording (if paused).
    ResumeRecording.Request  
    ResumeRecording.Response  
    SetRecordingFolder
    Please note: if SetRecordingFolder is called while a recording is in progress, the change won't be applied immediately and will be effective on the next recording.
    SetRecordingFolder.Request  
    SetRecordingFolder.Response  
    StartRecording
    Start recording.
    StartRecording.Request  
    StartRecording.Response  
    StartStopRecording
    Toggle recording on or off.
    StartStopRecording.Request  
    StartStopRecording.Response  
    StopRecording
    Stop recording.
    StopRecording.Request  
    StopRecording.Response
